ValidationRule.description: cannot change stage value after it is closed canceled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Profile.Name = "Standard Ads User Profile",
OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_DIRECT, RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_PROGRAMMATIC, RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_PMP ),
ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName), 'Closed Canceled'),
$Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator - Limited Privileges", $User.LastName <> "Adkins",
$Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c = FALSE
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change stage once it is Closed Canceled
